args.natural_language_statement: Translate: Galois proved that the alternating group A5 is simple. Galois also showed that the symmetry group of the general quintic equation (degree 5 polynomial with arbitrary variable coefficients) is S5. Assuming these facts, prove that the roots of a general quintic cannot be expressed in terms of radicals. Produce a Lean4 theorem statement (not full proof) that imports Mathlib and ends with := by sorry. Name the file srdoty_alg_simple-gps_308.lean and provide content accordingly.

result:
{"ok": true, "lean_translation": "import Mathlib
open Lean Meta
open Elab
open Tactic
open Qq
open Mathlib.Tactic.TryThis
open Lean.Meta.Rewrites
open Lean.Meta.LazyDiscrTree (ModuleDiscrTreeRef)
open Elab.Tactic.SolveByElim in
open Elab.Tactic.SolveByElim in

open Lean.Parser.Tactic (rwRuleSeq)
open Lean.Elab.Tactic (getMainGoal)
open Lean.Elab.Tactic (runTactic)
open Lean.Elab.Tactic (runTacticUsingMPGoal)
open Lean.Elab.Tactic (runTacticUsingMPGoa

args.content:
import Mathlib

/--
We state the classical Galois-theoretic consequence of two facts:
- A5 is simple (Galois proved A5 is simple),
- the Galois group of the general quintic is S5.

From these one concludes that the general quintic is not solvable by radicals.

This file only records the statement (with the usual `:= by sorry` placeholder),
not a full proof.
-/

constant A5_simple : Prop
constant galois_group_general_quintic_is_S5 : Prop
/-- Placeholder proposition expressing that the general quintic is solvable by radicals. -/
constant general_quintic_solvable_by_radicals : Prop

theorem general_quintic_not_solvable_by_radicals :
  A5_simple → galois_group_general_quintic_is_S5 → ¬ general_quintic_solvable_by_radicals := by sorry

import Mathlib

/--
Statement (following Galois): A5 is simple and the Galois group of the general
quintic is S5. From these facts one concludes the general quintic is not solvable by radicals.
This file only records the formal statement; proof omitted ("by sorry").
-/

variable {A5_simple : Prop}
variable {galois_group_general_quintic_is_S5 : Prop}
variable {general_quintic_solvable_by_radicals : Prop}

theorem general_quintic_not_solvable_by_radicals
  (hA5 : A5_simple)
  (hG : galois_group_general_quintic_is_S5) :
  ¬ general_quintic_solvable_by_radicals := by sorry

import Mathlib

/--
Statement (following Galois): A5 is simple and the Galois group of the general
quintic is S5. From these facts one concludes the general quintic is not solvable by radicals.
This file only records the formal statement; proof omitted ("by sorry").
-/

constant A5_simple : Prop
constant galois_group_general_quintic_is_S5 : Prop
constant general_quintic_solvable_by_radicals : Prop

/the-- main theorem -/
theorem general_quintic_not_solvable_by_radicals
  (hA5 : A5_simple)
  (hG : galois_group_general_quintic_is_S5) :
  ¬ general_quintic_solvable_by_radicals := by sorry

import Mathlib

/--
Statement (following Galois): A5 is simple and the Galois group of the general
quintic is S5. From these facts one concludes the general quintic is not solvable by radicals.
This file only records the formal statement; proof omitted ("by sorry").
-/

constant A5_simple : Prop
constant galois_group_general_quintic_is_S5 : Prop
constant general_quintic_solvable_by_radicals : Prop

/-- Main theorem: assuming A5 is simple and the Galois group of the general quintic is S5,
    the general quintic is not solvable by radicals. -/
theorem general_quintic_not_solvable_by_radicals
  (hA5 : A5_simple)
  (hG : galois_group_general_quintic_is_S5) :
  ¬ general_quintic_solvable_by_radicals := by sorry

import Mathlib

/--
Statement (following Galois): A5 is simple and the Galois group of the general
quintic is S5. From these facts one concludes the general quintic is not solvable by radicals.
This file only records the formal statement; proof omitted ("by sorry").
-/

axiom A5_simple : Prop
axiom galois_group_general_quintic_is_S5 : Prop
axiom general_quintic_solvable_by_radicals : Prop

/-- Main theorem: assuming A5 is simple and the Galois group of the general quintic is S5,
    the general quintic is not solvable by radicals. -/
theorem general_quintic_not_solvable_by_radicals
  (hA5 : A5_simple)
  (hG : galois_group_general_quintic_is_S5) :
  ¬ general_quintic_solvable_by_radicals := by sorry
